trans-unit.note: Title of the internationalization section in settings
Title of the language picker in settings
Toggable option to show or not show the welcome screen

trans-unit.id: This app was made with the purpose of teaching some localization strategies. It includes localization for English, Spanish and Arabic and you can switch between the locales at any time in the settings screen.
